data_description.system: System the event entities should be set up for.

choose_system.description: Please select the {ekeybionyx} system in which you want to set up the event entities.

webhooks.description: Please name your event entities. You can configure up to {webhooks_available} events. Leaving a name empty will skip the setup of that event. These names will be reflected in the {ekeybionyx} app.

data_description.url: Home Assistant instance URL which can be reached from the fingerprint controller

delete_webhooks.description: Event entites with Home Assistant were already configured. If you continue they will be removed.

progress.check_deletion_status: Please go to the {ekeybionyx} app and confirm the deletion of the functions.

abort.no_available_webhooks: There are no available webhooks in the {ekeybionyx} plattform. Please delete some and try again.
abort.no_own_systems: Your account does not have admin access to any systems
abort.cannot_connect: Connection to {ekeybionyx} failed. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
